thread.title: Twitter and the News: How People Use the Social Network to Learn About the World
thread.title_full: Twitter and the News: How People Use the Social Network to Learn About the World

title: Twitter and the News: How People Use the Social Network to Learn About the World
text: Print Page by: Tom Rosenstiel, Jeff Sonderman, Kevin Loker, Maria Ivancin and Nina Kjarval | API How does Twitter change the way people get news? What kinds of thought leaders, journalists and organizations do people follow on the network? How are these Twitter followers different than those on other social networks? And how are people reacting to added elements on Twitter, such as advertising and promoted tweets?
